gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentPropertiesAdditions` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_InvestmentPropertiesAdditions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_InvestmentPropertiesAdditions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesAdditionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesAdditionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesAdditionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesAdditionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentProperties` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesInDevelopmentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `InvestmentPropertiesInDevelopment` zonder `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesInDevelopmentMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentProperties` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesInExploitationMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `InvestmentPropertiesInExploitation` zonder `ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis` en `InvestmentPropertiesInExploitationMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentPropertiesMovement_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfInvestmentPropertiesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
